results.summary: The agent report correctly identified some root causes and metrics but missed key causal links and practical recommendations.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent identified CM as a root cause but incorrectly attributed DDR as a separate root cause.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured some causal links but missed the complete chain from CM to CPU to DDR to VCORE.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified most metrics, including VCORE and DDR percentages.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was mostly logical, with correct ruling out of MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No practical fixes or historical recommendations were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and metrics with logical reasoning, but lacks practical actionability suggestions.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and captured the concept of frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not explicitly mention the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the key VCORE and DDR percentages.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The diagnostic reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying root causes and reasoning but lacks some causal chain details and actionable recommendations.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the MMDVFS OPP3 issue and the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as root causes.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not explicitly mention the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified most metrics but missed some specific CPU frequency details.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The diagnostic reasoning was logical and correctly identified MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No practical fixes or historical recommendations were provided.
